title: Unchained Alistar
body: Idk how to get the alistar skin i subbed to leauge on youtube and its not giving me it. I submitted a support ticket is there anything i can do to get it faster?

replies.body:
A ticket is probably the quickest way of getting this sorted since you've already submitted one. Sit tight and we'll have a specialist (or maybe Blitzcrank Bot) with you soon.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3YMtmL49,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-31T04:47:25.155+0000)
>
> A ticket is probably the quickest way of getting this sorted since you've already submitted one. Sit tight and we'll have a specialist (or maybe Blitzcrank Bot) with you soon.
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions.

I do.

Why doesn't Blitzcrank bot always detect my ticket when I make new smurfs?

What keywords do I need to use?
